Prilaku Sohot setelah kemasukan Rakib kedalam jasadnya telah membuat Hariman dan Salim jadi bingung dan curiga

programme.title: Mother Gamer
programme.desc: Untuk menghalang anak lelaki kesayangannya yang menyertai kejohanan E-sukan, dia memutuskan untuk menubuhkan pasukannya sendiri untuk mengalahkannya dan menghapuskan impiannya untuk menjadi pemain permainan profesional.

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit S1 Ep8
programme.desc: EP. 8 mengisahkan Tat dan bapanya menuju ke rumah Rafiq untuk mencari Zana. Mereka menjumpai Zana sedang bercakap seorang diri di depan rumah Rafiq. Rafiq pula mendapati bahawa Sarakit berkelakuan pelik seperti marah dengan Rafiq kerana membeli barang-barang untuk bayi dan membuat ukiran kayu untuk bayi. Sarakit meminta Rafiq berjanji untuk tidak mengalih kasih sayangnya kepada bayi yang bakal lahir tetapi hanya tertumpu pada dirinya sahaja. Pada satu malam, Tat mendapati Zana di luar rumah dengan patung kayu yang dikatakan dihadiahkan oleh wanita cantik berbaju putih. Tat tidak tahan keluarganya sering diganggu hantu tenggek dan mengesyaki Sarakit adalah puncanya. Dalam keadaan marah, Tat telah membawa parang menuju ke rumah Sarakit walaupun ditegah oleh Jali. Keesokan harinya, mayat Tat dijumpai terkulai di atas pokok.

programme.title: Algojo: Perang Santet
programme.desc: Desta ialah seorang dewasa yang misteri dan menyendiri yang mencari orang yang bertanggungjawab atas kematian ibu bapanya kerana ingin membalas dendam. Dia mesti memutuskan sama ada untuk memenuhi keinginannya atau memilih tindakan yang lebih beradab.

programme.title: Tom Yum Goong
programme.desc: Tom yum goong (2005) ialah filem Thai,Inggeris,Mandarin,Vietnam. Prachya Pinkaew telah mengarahkan filem ini. Tony Jaa,Nathan Jones,Xing Jin,Petchtai Wongkamlao adalah pelakon filem ini. Ia telah dikeluarkan pada tahun 2005. Tom yum goong (2005) dianggap sebagai salah satu filem Aksi, Jenayah, Drama, Thriller terbaik di India dan di seluruh dunia.

programme.title: Plan B Ep9
programme.desc: Episod ke-9 ini mengisahkan Khai rasa terhina apabila dia diberi tugas membantu dalam penyelenggaraan stor dan penghantaran barangan di pejabat ayahnya, Dr. Rizman. Sebagai tuan punya syarikat, Dr.Rizman mahukan anaknya itu membina kerjaya bermula dari bawah, sepertimana yang pernah dilaluinya. Khai engan menerima tugas-tugas bawahan itu, terutamanya di syarikat kepunyaan ayahnya sendiri.

programme.title: The Secret Suster Ngesot Urban
programme.desc: Mengetahui bahawa bapanya telah berkahwin dengan seorang wanita sebayanya, Kanaya meninggalkan rumah, hanya untuk mengalami kemalangan yang menyebabkan dia di hospital berhantu.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep12
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shah, Adam dan Daniel masih berada di pekan di sempadan dalam usaha menjejaki dan mengesan lembaga perahu. Berbagai usaha dan ikhtiar dilakukan mereka. Ini termasuk meletakkan bubu yang mengandungi ikan ke dalam sungai di kawasan disyaki lembaga sungai berada. Akhirnya pada suatu malam, mereka dapat mengesan dan dengan kaedah senjata yang biasa mereka gunakan lembaga sungai itu dapat diperangkap. Walau pun mendapat tentangan oleh seorang wanita separuh umur, mengakui kepunyaannya tetapi dengan nasihat yang diberikan agar dia lebih keterampilan lalu mereka beredar dari wanita itu. Mereka bersiap hendak pulang. Shah lambat dan semasa Adam menurutnya ke bilik, Adam mendapati rupanya selama ini Shah yang sedang dilamun cinta dan berkasih terhadap Nur. Adam meminta penjelasan daripada Nur sebaik-baik mereka tiba dari bandar sempadan. Nur menjelaskan hatinya terpaut dengan Shah. Ibu Nur dan bapa Nur kini saling tidak sefahaman semula akibat baju. Nur agakkecewa tetapi akan berusaha lagi.

programme.title: Bodyguard S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Memaparkan Shamsul menghantar gambar bapa tirinya Kamal bersama Salina kepada emaknya. Kamal memujuk isterinya sebenarnya Salina adalah rakan niaga dan bukan kekasihnya. Farish masih tidak percaya dengan Kamal. Ryan pula menjadi bodyguard kepada Dato’ Dahalan, kekasih Dato’ Dahalan bernama Fazura. Ryan diminta menyiasat kegiatan Fazura selepas diberi wang sebanyak RM 200,00. Ryan mendapati Fazura menggunakan wang tersebut untuk mendapatkan semula hutang anak Dato Dahalan dengannya. Dalam kes berasingan, Taufik memberi amaran kepada Sarrah. Dia akan mencederakannya selepas Sarrah memutuskan hubungan mereka. Untuk keselamatan, Bakri akan terus menjaga Sarrah. Taufik telah membawa rakannya untuk memukul Bakri.

programme.title: Titik Hitam
programme.desc: Sesiapa yang mati dahulu, yang mati mesti memberitahu kepada yang hidup bagaimana perjalanan kematian mereka.

programme.title: Konstabel Mamat
programme.desc: Akibat kelalaian dalam operasi menangkap ketua gengster iaitu Mail Musang yang merupakan bapa ayam sindiket pelacuran di Kuala Lumpur, Mamat digantung tugas selama tiga bulan. Meskipun digantung, Mamat tetap rajin dan menjalankan tugas menangkap penjenayah. Mamat yang jatuh cinta dengan kekasih gelap kepada Mail Musang telah diketahui olehnya. Kejadian ini telah membawa kepada penangkapan Mail dan Mamat tidak lagi digantung tugas.

programme.title: Talak
programme.desc: Johan dan Liza sering bertengkar sehingga membawa kepada penceraian. Tetapi setiap kali ianya terjadi, mereka akan merujuk kembali. Tanpa disedari, Johan telah pun melafazkan talak kepada Liza sebanyak tiga kali, ini menyebabkan mereka tidak boleh merujuk kembali. Johan terpaksa mencari lelaki yang boleh dipercayai untuk berkahwin dengan Liza supaya mereka boleh kembali bersama. Namun, malang menimpa apabila lelaki untuk tidak mahu melepaskan Liza.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Panglima Badol
programme.desc: Badol ingin keluar merantau mencari pengalaman hidup seperti apa yang dilakukan bapanya. Ditentang ibunya namun direlakan dengan satu syarat - tidak boleh mengambil tahu perihal orang lain. Setibanya di sebuah pulau, kekecohan berlaku apabila Maya Sari, anak angkat Datuk Tumpang dilarikan konco Datuk Panglima Wira. Badol secara tidak sengaja berjaya menyelamatkan Maya Sari dan diberi gelaran Panglima Badol.

programme.title: Gila-Gila
programme.desc: Jaafar, seorang pembantu di rumah orang kaya bernama Dato' Jaafar Pangku. Niat ingin mengubah nasibnya, Jaafar pun mengambil cuti dua bulan dan pergi ke Kuala Lumpur. Sebelum itu, dia telah meminjam baju dan wang majikannya sebanyak RM3000 atas alasan melawat neneknya yang sakit. Setibanya dia di sana, Jaafar bertemu dengan Kathy dan jatuh cinta. Hal sebenar terbongkar apabila wangnya habis dan terpaksa pulang semula ke Sabah.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Ingin cuba melakukan perubahan demi kemajuan di kampung namun tidak semua bersetuju dengan perubahan yang dibawa olehnya. Pelbagai halangan perlu ditempuhinya namun dia bersikap pantang berundur sebelum berjuang.

programme.title: Adik Manja
programme.desc: Guru lelaki pertama di sekolah berasrama penuh perempuan terpaksa menyembunyikan satu rahsia besar apabila terpaksa membawa pulang seorang bayi lelaki. Pelbagai helah terpaksa digunakannya namun diketahui juga oleh pelajar-pelajar institusi itu. Pelajar-pelajar tersebut mengambil keputusan untuk membantunya bersama seorang lagi guru di situ.

programme.title: Guru Badul
programme.desc: Badul diambil bekerja di pejabat Hj. Lamin sebagai seorang pengutip hutang. Badul sebenarnya berpura-pura menjadi orang alim membuatkan Hj. Lamin sangat tertarik akan perwatakannya itu. Dia banyak mempelajari ilmu agama dengan Badul dan ingin menjadikannya sebagai seorang menantu. Namun satu insiden telah memecahkan rahsianya apabila Hj. Lamin terlihat Badul sedang menari-nari.

programme.title: Salah Bapak
programme.desc: Jamil dan Osman terpaksa melalui pelbagai rintangan untuk menuntut hak mereka ke atas harta peninggalan Al-Sagof, bapa mereka yang telah meninggal dunia. Pak Joko ingin cuba membolot harta Al-Sagof lalu merancang pelbagai taktik kotor untuk mendapatkannya. Seroja, gadis yang menyewa tapak tanak bapa mereka untuk membuka warung turut terlibat apabila dia digunakan Pak Joko.

programme.title: Ragam Pemandu
programme.desc: Pemandu yang setia dan tidak pernah mengeluh, Hamid tidak disukai oleh isteri tuannya, Rubiah. Tuannya, Rahim pula seorang yang baik hati dan sukakan Hamid. Dia sering membantu membiayai pelajaran anak-anak Hamid dan menyelesaikan masalah yang dihadapi olehnya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Hamid dan Dharma keluar merantau mencari kekayaan di bandar bertemu Nora dan Norlia. Hamid, penjual jagung rebus dan Dharma, penjaga lif tinggal di rumah milik pasangan suami isteri dan berjiran bersama Nora dan Norlia. Kerana ingin mencari kekayaan dengan menggunakan jalan mudah, pelbagai kesusahan terpaksa dihadapi oleh mereka berdua.

programme.title: Kemarau Cinta
programme.desc: Seorang pemuda kampung yang ingin membawa perubahan di kampungnya. Pergi menuntut ilmu di bandar, pemuda ini pulang semula ke kampung selepas selesai pengajiannya. Satu pertengkaran menyebabkan Hamid berhenti kerja namun Rahim tampil membantu mengambilnya bekerja di syarikat insurans miliknya.

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Abang
programme.desc: Anak lelaki sulung dan waris kepada keluarga kaya Kuala Lumpur pulang ke tanah air selepas pemergian mengejut ke London sedekad lalu. Keluarganya bergelut dengan emosi mereka tentang kepulangannya sementara dia cuba menjadikan kehidupan seperti biasa kerana dia mungkin tahu bagaimana dan mengekalkan rahsianya.

programme.title: Tmo Hanya Kau Yang Satu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Hanya Kau Yang Satu

programme.title: Somsri
programme.desc: Siapa kata robot tidak mempunyai hati? Ter, seorang pencipta yang mencipta robot yang kelihatan seperti wanita sebenar, bernama Somsri. Terdapat dua keluarga saingan, satu dengan robot dan satu lagi dengan manusia. Keseronokan bermula apabila kedua-dua keluarga cuba sedaya upaya untuk memalukan antara satu sama lain

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: The Spiral
programme.desc: Jon Caine, pensyarah universiti yang dihormati, didapati hilang. Tiga bulan kemudian dia muncul semula dan membunuh sekumpulan orang awam dan polis di sebuah kafe. Selepas ditangkap oleh Detektif Inspektor Aleana, dia dihantar ke hospital mental untuk disoal siasat oleh pakar psikologi jenayah, Dr Melanie Surya. Melanie tidak lama kemudian mengetahui bahawa kewujudannya adalah kunci kepada perubahan mendadak Jon dalam tingkah laku dan akhirnya, dia membuka kunci rahsia Jon yang telah disimpan dalam dirinya.

programme.title: Bakal Suami Akan Datang
programme.desc: Seorang pereka grafik yang baru menamatkan pengajian sedang mencari pekerjaan dalam ekonomi yang teruk ini, apabila dia bertemu seorang mekanik dan jatuh cinta dengannya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Tmo Milik Siapa Syurga Itu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Milik Siapa Syurga Itu

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Sarang Hantu Jakarta
programme.desc: Seorang eksekutif muda, istrinya, dan putrinya mengalami keanehan hantu di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Haji Gugel
programme.desc: Arman yang tak pernah langsung ke Mekah, apatah lagi mengerjakan haji, sentiasa menjual temberang dengan lagaknya kepada orang-orang kampung tentang haji, dengan berdasarkan internet "Google" sahaja.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S13 Ep12
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Jeman
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Jeman yang berusia 20an mengalami masalah lembam, ibunya meninggal dunia ketika melahirkannya.Jeman dibesarkan oleh neneknya Mak Wan. Manakala ayahnya Jalil sudah berkahwin lain.

programme.title: The Spiral
programme.desc: Jon Caine, pensyarah universiti yang dihormati, didapati hilang. Tiga bulan kemudian dia muncul semula dan membunuh sekumpulan orang awam dan polis di sebuah kafe. Selepas ditangkap oleh Detektif Inspektor Aleana, dia dihantar ke hospital mental untuk disoal siasat oleh pakar psikologi jenayah, Dr Melanie Surya. Melanie tidak lama kemudian mengetahui bahawa kewujudannya adalah kunci kepada perubahan mendadak Jon dalam tingkah laku dan akhirnya, dia membuka kunci rahsia Jon yang telah disimpan dalam dirinya.

programme.title: Tmo Milik Siapa Syurga Itu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Milik Siapa Syurga Itu

programme.title: Bisu
programme.desc: Nazim menyesal tak sempat berjasa dan menunaikan umrah untuk ibunya. Dia mencari calon ibu yang sesuai untuk disedekahkan pakej umrah. Doanya dimakbul bila terjumpa dengan Mak Nong, peminta sedekah yang bisu.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pondok Senja
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga hartawan perkapalan yang mempunyai seorang anak tunggal yang sedang belajar di universiti iaiti Zulfa, dilanda kejutan tentang pewarisan harta dan juga aset perniagaan.

programme.title: Tiada Tajuk
programme.desc: tiga orang pemuda kampung yang ingin menjadi penyanyi rock dan pop terkenal. Mereka berimpian besar tetapi tidak dihargai di kampung mereka. Pelbagai cabaran dan dugaan perlu mereka hadapi demi mencapai impian.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Kanta Serigala
programme.desc: seorang abang yang cuba membalas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Adiknya seorang remaja berbakat berkeinginan untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi terkenal dan berpengaruh seperti penyanyi pujaannya telah menjadi mangsa penipuan, diperkosa dan dibunuh dua lelaki yang menyamar kakitangan syarikat rakam

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Bukan Orang Buta
programme.desc: eorang pemuzik jalanan (busker) yang berbakat tetapi tidak diberi perhatian orang ramai telah menukar strateginya untuk menyamar sebagai seorang busker buta. Penyamarannya mula menarik perhatian ramai dan berjaya dilamar oleh sebuah syarikat muzik terkemuka.

programme.title: Abang
programme.desc: Anak lelaki sulung dan waris kepada keluarga kaya Kuala Lumpur pulang ke tanah air selepas pemergian mengejut ke London sedekad lalu. Keluarganya bergelut dengan emosi mereka tentang kepulangannya sementara dia cuba menjadikan kehidupan seperti biasa kerana dia mungkin tahu bagaimana dan mengekalkan rahsianya.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S13 Ep13
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: Time Machine
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar dari bandar pergi meredah hutan dengan bantuan seorang pemburu muda sebagai pemandu pelancong. Kebakaran hutan memaksa mereka melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan nyawa mereka. Kumpulan itu sesat dan tersandung ke wilayah Myanmar di tengah-tengah peperangan antara tentera Myanmar dan penyamun hutan.

programme.title: Pondok Senja
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga hartawan perkapalan yang mempunyai seorang anak tunggal yang sedang belajar di universiti iaiti Zulfa, dilanda kejutan tentang pewarisan harta dan juga aset perniagaan.

programme.title: Tmo Playboy Kantoi
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Playboy Kantoi

programme.title: Makcik Acapella
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sofjan, seorang penyanyi terkenal telah menghilangkan diri selepas kontroversi hebat menimpa dirinya. Saat kejatuhannya itu, dia telah lari ke kampung Mak Longnya, Salmiah.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Jodoh Tak Salah Alamat
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Luqman pernah mengenali seorang gadis bernama Diana ketika Diana melanggar keretanya dahulu. Diana berpenampilan seksi dan mengamalkan cara hidup barat membuatkan Luqman bersangka buruk terhadap Diana. Satu hari, Luqman ke masjid dan terserempak dengan seorang gadis cantik iaitu Adawiyah. Tanpa mengetahui, Adawiyah dan Diana adalah orang yang sama. Diana pernah terlibat dengan kemalangan dan sejak itu hidupnya berubah sepenuhnya.

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Aku Istri Yang Dicintai Tapi Sering Disakiti
programme.desc: Pernikahan Andy dan Dina hancur kerana hasutan ibu Andy dan Rika. Ibunya Andy berambisi untuk menyingkirkan Dina dan berusaha supaya Rika boleh menjadi isteri Andy. Bagaimanakah nasib rumah tangga Andy dan Dina seterusnya?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep131
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep59
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep10
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep90
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep132
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Gadis Penjual Es Cincau Yang Berhasil Menjadi Dokter Bedah Otak
programme.desc: Kasih tinggal bersama atoknya yang berjualan es cincau keliling sejak ibunya meninggal dunia. Atok Kasih menjadi sakit dan membuat hidup mereka semakin sulit. Dalam usaha untuk mewujudkan cita-cita ibunya, yaitu agar Kasih bisa kuliah, Kasih pun mengambil alih bisnis es cincau atok demi mencari nafkah.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep31
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep33
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep145
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Aku Istri Yang Berkorban Demi Masa Depan Anakku
programme.desc: Kehidupan Meli sangatlah berat terutama setelah kehidupan rumah tangganya dihancurkan oleh suaminya sendiri. Sebagai seorang istri dan ibu, Meli sangatlah terluka dan kecewa apabila ia dikhianati oleh suaminya. Arga seolah-olah hanya menggunakan Meli sebagai alat untuk memperoleh wang sementara dia sendiri menikah dengan pengasuh anaknya. Meli juga harus berjuang untuk memenangi semula kasih sayang anaknya yang telah dipaksa membencinya oleh Arga dan Ayu. Apakah yang sebenarnya berlaku?

programme.title: Oppa KW Terlalu Meresahkan
programme.desc: Berjodoh dengan Oppa KW memang membuat Hesti berasa gelisah, begitulah yang berlaku pada Hesti pemandu van yang mengira Binsar adalah Oppa Korea sebenar.

programme.title: Ada Apa Dengan Cewek Ayam Crispy
programme.desc: Ima, penjual Ayam Crispy, lebih laris daripada restoran Ayam Crispy milik Alfi. Alfi selalu mencari cara untuk mendekati Ima agar dapat mengetahui resep rahasia Ayam Crispy miliknya dan restorannya bisa ramai pengunjung.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep145

Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Tukul Arwana One Man Show Ep13
programme.desc: Sebuah program bual bicara yang dihoskan Tukul Arwana di Indosiar menyajikan hiburan terbaru yang akan menemani penonton semasa pandemik COVID-19 bersama bintang jemputan, tokoh masyarakat dan mereka yang tular di media sosial.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep146
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Kukira Gurame Ternyata Dia Yang Bikin Rame
programme.desc: Rasti dan Dimas sama-sama tersakiti karena diselingkuhi oleh pacar masing-masing. Awalnya, mereka saling benci kerana Dimas bertindak seenaknya terhadap Rasti, tapi akhirnya mereka malah saling jatuh cinta.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep33
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Soar Into The Sun
programme.desc: An elite combat pilot carries a rescue mission to his missing teammate while facing threats from the north.

programme.title: I Don'T Fire Myself
programme.desc: Being discriminated as a woman, Jeong-eun was dispatched and given great pressure to resign, but she is not willing to simply give up...

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: A couple travel to a remote island for a restaurant famous online, yet unexpected danger awaits when they met the restaurant owner.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Golden Slumber
programme.desc: A delivery man finds himself entwined in a dangerous conspiracy when he is accused of assassinating a presidential candidate. To stay alive, he must uncover the truth and clear his name.

programme.title: The Pirates
programme.desc: Before the founding of the Joseon Dynasty, envoys from China lose the Royal Seal to a whale. A group of bandits attempt to retrieve it for a large reward and run into a group of pirates.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Tooth And The Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the "House of Horrors".

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Tazza: One Eyed Jack
programme.desc: A young poker joins a poker team lead by the legendary One-Eyed Jack to pay off his debt, but a single mistake puts the entire team in a life-or-death situation.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.desc: Continuing the pattern of last season, a group of young men and women over the age of 30 are invited to live in an apartment for one month. Guests like Michelle Chen, Hito Du, Bridgette Qiao, Orfila Wu, Ava Wang, etc. will observe the whole process the occurrence of love for these few couples.

programme.title: Share Life Ep1
programme.desc: Focusing on the life of the youngsters with Shanghai as the story background, six guests of different ages, occupations and genders would “share life” for 105 days because of various reasons. The observation group includes G.E.M., Li Dan, Chen Jian Bin, Wei Da Xun, Zeng Ke Ni, and Yang Li.

programme.title: Strawberryman Ep14
programme.desc: Breaking the traditional mode of music variety show, around 24 groups of rock bands, folk bands, hip-hop, electronic and other styles of musicians are invited to perform in an outdoor concert and become a member of Strawberryman. The guests include Jam Hsiao, GAI, and Zhang Ya Dong.

programme.title: The Shape Of Culture Season 2 Ep12
programme.desc: The cultural show invited Shan Jixiang, Yun Zhou, Yan Xiao, Niu Junfeng as "youth troupe" to present new wonders, new landmarks, new sights and the diversity of world heritages and civilization from multiple perspectives and to undercover the story of the World Heritage sites behind.

programme.title: Camping Life Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The initiator William Chan invited his friends, Wei Daxun, Lil Ghost, Di Yang, Yin Zheng & Zhang Yanqi, to complete 5 themed camps with building different kind of ideal life portraits.

programme.title: Super Mom Ep2
programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: All Reviving Ep10
programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. Yang Lan, the Chinese media proprietor & journalist, brings us to visit the inheritors of 11 intangible cultural heritage skills with cultural successors, discovers the essence of Chinese excellent traditional culture.

programme.title: Tour With Classics Season 2 Ep13
programme.desc: The program helps to explore humanistic perception and tourism experience via outdoor visit and leads the audience to experience the beautiful scenery, spread humanities, review history, re-visit classics by feeling the soul of cultural spirit.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep10

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep2728
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46404641
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2050
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3624
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2051
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep159
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep952
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep3132
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46424643

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1822
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3377
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2663
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep952
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep101
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep217218
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep451
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep1213
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard who is suffering from early stages of dementia befriends a young girl whose life is threatened when her father falls in with the international crime world. The girl disappeared one day, and the bodyguard vows to save the life of his young friend.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nation’s Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: Love on a Diet
programme.desc: Mini's broken heart leads her to pack on the pounds. She meets an obese man named Fatso who helps her get back on track and shed the pounds. After dropping the unwanted heft, Mini rekindles her relationship with her first love, but is this the happy ending that she wants?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sect’s Zhang Chui Shan’s son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xu’s life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: Qin Feng was tricked by Tang Ran to participate in the "World Detective Contest" in New York's Chinatown. Their task is to find the murderer of the grandson of Godfather, Uncle Qi. When famous detectives from all over the world investigate the case, two other cases occurred with a very similar modus operandi…

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn’s beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong’s concubine as he knows Dong’s adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon “Thundering Sword” to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Buddha'S Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: The Dream Of The Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father’s death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family…

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan…

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire’s Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: Tamil Sports Drama, Starring, Sivakarthikeyan, Aishwarya Rajesh, Blade Shankar, Sathyaraj, Fathima Samreen & Others

programme.title: Bayama Irukku
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Santhosh Prathap, Reshmi Menon, Kovai Sarala, Rajendran, Bharani, Jagan, Lollu Sabha Jeeva & Others

programme.title: Chithirai Sevvanam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Film, Starring, Rima Kallingal, Pooja Kannan, Pranavbond, Samuthirakani & Others

programme.title: Endrendrum Punnagai
programme.desc: Tamil Love Film, Starring, Jeeva, Trisha, Andrea & others

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Balakrishna, Katrina Kaif, and Charmy Kaur

programme.title: World Television Premiere - Dey Kanna
programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Comedy film, Starring - Raj Tarun, Malavika Nair & Hebah Patel

programme.title: Vetrikani
programme.desc: Tamil sports drama film, Starring - Varun Tej, Saiee Manjrekar, Jagapathi Babu, Upendra, Suniel Shetty, Naveen Chandra

programme.title: Inji Iduppazhagi
programme.desc: Tamil romantic comedy film, Starring, Anushka Shetty, Sonal Chauhan, Arya, Prakash Raj & Others

programme.title: Magalir Mattum
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Jyothika, Saranya Ponvannan, Urvashi, Bhanupriya & Others

programme.title: F3: Fun, Frustration And Fun
programme.desc: Tamil comedy film, Starring - Venkatesh, Varun Tej, Tamannaah & Mehreen Pirzada

programme.title: Aan Devathai
programme.desc: Tamil Family Drama, Starring, Samuthirakani, Ramya Pandiyan, Sujatha Naidu, Hareesh Peradi, Radha Ravi & Others

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India
programme.desc: Tamil Action Movie, Starring, Allu Arjun, Anu Emmanuel, Thakur Anoop Singh, Nadhiya, Arjun Sarja & Others

programme.title: Geethanjali
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Horror Film, Starring - Anjali & Srinivasa Reddy

programme.title: Kallan
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring,starring Karu Palaniappan, Nikita, Soundararaja, Maya Chandran, Namo Narayana & Others

programme.title: Anandham Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: Tamil Action Drama Film, starring Cheran, Saravanan, Gautham Karthik, Daniel Balaji & Others

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Thriller Film, Starring, Nayantara, Thambi Ramaiah, Harish Uthaman, Sulile Kumar, Shan & Others

programme.title: Bimbisara
programme.desc: Tamil fantasy action film, Starring - Nadumuri Kalyana Ram, Catherine Tresa, Samyuktha Menon & Prakash Raj

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: Thalaivi is a Indian historical drama, which is loosely based on the life of the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa, Starring,'Kangana Ranaut, Arvind Swami

programme.title: Dhilukku Dhuddu 2

programme.title: En Rasavin Manasile
programme.desc: Solaiamma hastily agrees to marry Mayandi as he is an alcoholic, but love blooms between the couple when Mayandi changes himself. However, he is shattered when she dies after giving birth to a baby.

programme.title: Goli Soda 2
programme.desc: A taxi driver, a gangster and an athlete want to create a space for themselves. However, when fate strikes, they end up losing everything and their struggle towards reclaiming their lives begins.

programme.title: Super
programme.desc: Sonu adopts Siri after her father dies. Upon learning that she loves Akhil, his arch-rival, he urges her to put an end to their relationship as he feels Akhil is responsible for his sister's death.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep40
programme.desc: Malishka rejoices when Rishi asks her to come home with him and tells Karishma that Rishi will never betray her. Later, Laxmi tends to Rishi's injured foot.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep41
programme.desc: Rishi tries to convince Malishka that she is his one and only love interest. Later, Lakshmi is shocked as she sees Rishi and Malishka hugging each other.

programme.title: Lakshana Ep14
programme.desc: Bhupathi goes in search of Nakshatra when she fails to return home. Later, Nakshatra gets emotional and tells Bhupathi that people treat her differently because of her skin tone.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep55
programme.desc: While Rocky gets a tempting deal, Pavitra hopes that he does not fall prey to evil tricks. Later, things get intense when Rocky gets attacked.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep56
programme.desc: Things get romantic between Rocky and Pavitra as they get close to each other. Later, Pavitra is taken aback when Rani begins to accuse her.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep57
programme.desc: Rocky mentions that the Rajput family will celebrate Diwali together. Meanwhile, Pavitra expresses her excitement to celebrate Diwali with the entire family.

programme.desc: A man falls in love with a medical student but his attempts to woo her are rejected at every turn. However, she soon reveals her desire to exact revenge on a notorious mobster.

programme.title: Agni Devi
programme.desc: A policeman is asked to stop investigating the murder of a journalist because of pressure from Shakuntala Devi, a powerful politician.

programme.title: Annmariya Kalippilanu
programme.desc: Annmaria, a schoolgirl, approaches Gireesh, a local thug, to seek revenge against her teacher. However, when he learns about her innocence and kindness, his outlook towards life completely changes.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep42
programme.desc: Rishi catches Lakshmi as she is about to fall and both of them share a moment. Later, Lakshmi is shocked to see Rishi and Malishka sharing an intimate hug.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep43
programme.desc: Karishma worries about Lakshmi making a place in everyone's heart. Elsewhere, Rishi confesses to Ayush that he loves Malishka and not Lakshmi.

programme.title: Lakshana Ep15
programme.desc: Nakshatra offers her advice on her radio show and uses Bhupathi's issues as a topic. Later, Bhupathi listens to Nakshatra's radio show and suspects Nakshatra to be RJ Sakhi.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep58
programme.desc: The Rajputs are surprised to witness Veer's arrival in a delivery box, while Shikha joyfully welcomes him. However, Pavitra grows suspicious about his true identity and informs Rocky about the same.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep59
programme.desc: Pavitra performs the ritual after listening to Nashak's advice. Meanwhile, Rani intervenes and sabotages the ritual and mocks Pavitra.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep60
programme.desc: Aided by an anonymous letter, Rocky and Pavitra carry out an elaborate ritual to free Sanchit from Rani's influence. Meanwhile, Rani gets wind of Pavitra's plans and decides to stop her.

programme.desc: A retired army officer returns to his home town looking forward to a life of peace and quiet. However, an untoward incident forces him to arm up against a local don.

programme.title: Murder On Omaha Beach
programme.desc: An American veteran is found tied to a pole in his uniform on a landing beach, allegedly executed “as an example”. Captain Eloise has to overcome personal grievances and work with her estranged father, a WWII expert, on the perplexing case.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Schroeders
programme.desc: With their youngest son Max’s graduation over, Sabine and Bernd find themselves alone with one another. But this new stage of life comes with teething challenges: both have their own dreams and they will have to compromise for one another.

programme.title: I Was, I Am, I Will Be
programme.desc: Baran, a Kurdish gigolo seeking a better life in Europe meets Marion, a German pilot struggling with her cancer diagnosis. Entering into what was initially a sham marriage, the pair's relationship develops into something deeper.

programme.title: Blood Pressure
programme.desc: Nicole, a 41-year-old wife bored with her mundane life, receives letters from a mysterious observer. Enticed, she plays along but they soon get out of hand and threaten to tear apart her relationship with her husband and two teenage children.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: When a Palestinian girl disappears, the Australian media jumps on the news like vultures. She is painted as an Islamic extremist who has joined ISIS. Her family vehemently denies the accusations as they struggle to cope with their grief and confusion.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: Murder in Herault
programme.desc: There’s a double homicide – a boss of a nightclub is found murdered while a campsite manager is discovered with a fox mask on her corpse. Just as the police discover a startling link between the murders, a new corpse wearing a wolf mask surfaces.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Murder On Omaha Beach

programme.title: A Summer in the Algarve
programme.desc: After having her research stolen by her boyfriend, marine biologist Dr. Julika Bergmann decides to leave Germany and visit a friend in Portugal. There, she is offered her dream job by a businessman to renaturalize coral reefs, but all is not what it seems.

programme.title: The Salvation Of The World As We Know It
programme.desc: After a suicide attempt, 17-year-old Paul is sent to a psychiatric centre by his father. There, he encounters other youths with issues just like him, one of whom is Toni.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.

programme.title: Murder in Herault
programme.desc: There’s a double homicide – a boss of a nightclub is found murdered while a campsite manager is discovered with a fox mask on her corpse. Just as the police discover a startling link between the murders, a new corpse wearing a wolf mask surfaces.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: The Last Straw
programme.desc: Mother Earth has always been collecting plastic ever since mankind stopped caring about the amount of plastic that was endangering their home planet. This leads Mother Earth to punish mankind and all that comes with it.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Who Framed Santa Claus?
programme.desc: Wonderfast, a highly successful online delivery company, enjoys great business all year around except during Christmas. Despite attempts to sabotage Santa Claus, their efforts produce unexpected results. Will the Christmas spirit prevail after all?

programme.title: Garden Lane
programme.desc: Eric and Elin were both children to drug addict parents and had traumatic childhoods. As adults, they serendipitously meet at a funeral. As they relive the ghosts of their past, they struggle to find strength in one another as they once did as kids.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S4 9

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: "Choosing not to believe in the devil won't protect you from him." Academy Award® winner Anthony Hopkins stars in this supernatural thriller that reveals the devil's reach to even one of the holiest places on earth. Inspired by true events chronicled by Rome-based journalist Matt Baglio, this exorcism drama follows a skeptical seminary student (Colin O'Donoghue) attending an exorcism school at the Vatican. While in Rome, he's sent to apprentice with an unorthodox priest (Hopkins) who introduces him to the darker side of his faith. Also starring I Am Legend's Alice Braga, Rome's Ciarán Hinds, Harry Potter's Toby Jones and Blade Runner's Rutger Hauer, this haunting chiller demonstrates how a disillusioned young priest ultimately finds his true faith by facing pure evil.

programme.title: The Amazing Race S34 Ep7

She is adorned in a famous gigantic diamond which, of course, entices dim-witted bumbling crooks (Harold Gould, Karen Valentine, Larry Storch and John Schuck), in a delightful caper reminiscent of old Hollywood. A husband (Dan Rowan) is chagrined into bringing his wife (Juliet Mills) on the cruise when she finds the tickets for his mistress (Adrienne Barbeau) and himself, with some unexpected surprises. Two former attendees of a blind school (Desi Arnaz Jr. and Stephanie Zimbalist) are reunited. A masquerade night moves the plots right along.

programme.title: The Love Boat S1 Ep16

programme.desc: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat.

programme.title: World's Most Dangerous Roads 4 S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Australia - Actor Stephen Mangan and comedian Lara Ricote, who have never met before, aim to reach the northernmost point of Australia.

programme.title: Snow Dogs: Into the Wild 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog. First, Gordon must train his dogs and earn their trust. Next they must learn to travel as a team.

programme.title: Extreme Treks 4 S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Ethiopia, Simien Mountains - The Simien Mountains is an exotic and dramatic landscape set in the northern corner of Ethiopia. Breath-taking views abound in this natural landscape inhabited by unique and endangered wildlife.

programme.title: Baby Chimp Rescue 1 S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New Beginning - At Liberia's only home for rescued chimpanzees, new arrivals keep flooding in. Jimmy and Jenny Desmond and their team are now at breaking point.

programme.title: Spy in the Ocean 1 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep Thinkers - Our Spies search the ocean for intelligent life. In this episode, Spy Sperm Whale has close encounters with the largest brains on the planet, while Spy Octopus takes us inside the mind of the world's smartest octopus. From ocean-diving macaques to fish artistry, from hermit crab cooperation to clownfish teamwork, a new team of spies will leave you thinking differently about life in the ocean.
