programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild 3 S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Pembrokeshire, Wales - Adventurer Ben Fogle returns to the Pembrokeshire coast to catch up with Matthew and Charis Watkinson, and their two children.

programme.title: The Ganges with Sue Perkins 1 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Gangetic Plain - The Gangetic Plain is where the ancient and modern collide - from the sacred city of Varanasi to Patna, a city fast becoming India's Silicon Valley. It's here also that the Ganges faces its greatest threats from dams, pollution, industry and agriculture.

programme.title: Climate Change - The Facts
programme.desc: After one of the hottest years on record, Sir David Attenborough looks at the science of climate change and potential solutions to this global threat.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Florida - Florida is famous for its sandy shores—and there’s plenty to go around. Florida has the most tidal shoreline of any state in the continental USA. These ocean-side playgrounds are also critical habitats for threatened and endangered species.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that won’t go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks she’s a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place in the Wild - Kenya takes a major step with the opening of its first community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory. The threat to Kenya’s rhinos from armed, illegal poaching gangs is the highest it's been in 40 years, which makes the sanctuary vital.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Masked Bandits - Capture teams from Kenya head to Somali border to capture 50 rare and endangered antelope called a hirola. The hirola numbers have been plummeting over the last decade, and conservation groups know that by capturing and placing them into a protected predator-free conservancy they will rebound.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Damning Truth - A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Feast - Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just can’t resist.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Return to the Wild - These orangutans have come a long way! Six jungle school graduates are finally set free, ready to start a new life in a National Park. Back at basecamp, clumsy climber Malika tries to keep up with her class, and Beni’s strict diet is hard to handle.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Creatures of the Night - Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know they’re not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Back from the Dead - Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Head & Neck - Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Defenders of the Reef - It’s summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Capuchin’s Tale - Growing up in the rainforests in the heart of Colombia, a young capuchin monkey has to master his climbing skills, learn how to find food and learn to distinguish friend from foe.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Nova Scotia - At either edge of the province, Nova Scotia proves that any beach is built from raw forces in opposition, but also that balance between those forces is necessary if life is to thrive.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep5

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, who’s honing her survival skills in Brazil’s Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina’s coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria’s side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Human Influenced - In geological and biological scales, humans have only been around for the blink of an eye, and yet we’ve managed to influence the evolutionary path for many animals. Explore the human impact on dogs, wolves, coyotes, elephants, and more.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Interior - Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Great Addo Elephant - The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the “big seven”: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain - Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: iSimangoliso - In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as “the Miracle”, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - A veteran pair of osprey return home to a Connecticut saltmarsh. Over one summer they must battle their enemies, withstand the elements, and hunt hundreds and hundreds of fish, all to raise the next generation of sea raptors.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealand’s Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, “Ixchel,” who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep2

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Wild Swaziland - Despite its small size, Swaziland boasts Big Five status and some 132 species of mammals have been recorded there. Giraffe, hippo, zebra, and a variety of antelope can be found across the country, as can predators such as jackals and hyenas.

programme.desc: Graham is joined by Jamie Dornan, James Norton, Sophie Okonedo and Siobhán McSweeney. Plus Lewis Capaldi performs his current single Pointless.

programme.desc: Jamie is reinventing family favourities, and today he's cooking Jerk chicken, Hummus, and Rocky Road.

programme.desc: Jamie is reinventing family favourities, and today he's cooking a pork dish, drizzle cake, and a Negroni Cocktail.

programme.desc: Lei Ying and David - Using virtual reality, architects Laura and Will compete to remodel a 1950s home in Belfast. Will the finished build give the family the space they desperately need?

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S6 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Dessert Day and the second heat of bakers make stacks of gooey, chocolatey deliciousness and a mash-up dessert combining elements that wouldn't usually share the same plate.

programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals S3 Ep9
programme.desc: It's the semi-final, and the four remaining teams face a secret recipe challenge before making a magical Charlotte Russe display and some gourmet theatre, as they compete for a place in the final.

programme.desc: Gnocchi, Torta, Pancake Nidi, Tagliatelle - Michela demonstrates how to create the most amazing variations of pasta including gnocchi, torta, pancake nidi and tagliatelle

programme.desc: Private Jets - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious private jets.

programme.desc: Today Jamie's serving up a delicious roast pork fillet wrapped in prosciutto and smothered in pesto.

programme.desc: It's Pastry Day for the second heat of bakers and their last chance to win a place in finals week. They make a Spanish snack with a twist and a showstopping celebration pie.

programme.desc: The best three teams compete to be crowned the winner as they construct chocolate hats worn by real models and a mind-blowing historical banquet for friends and family.

programme.desc: Stacey Solomon and her crack team help childhood sweethearts Dan and Char and their two daughters, Mia and Cece, transform their family home through a life-changing declutter.

programme.title: The Great Australian Bake Off S5 Ep10

programme.desc: Ice Cave, Steep Drive And Deep Dive - Mike Baker, Kari Bryon and Lou Hack are going off the grid. Mike explores mysterious blue rooms under a glacier in Alaska.

programme.title: America: All Access S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Meet Crazy Horse - Discover CIA secrets, learn how to beat an all-you-can-eat Vegas buffet and more.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Hunt For Extraterrestrials S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Roswell Revealed - Josh's epic search for extraterrestrial life comes to a close in the USA, where a legendary investigation team brings him to a hot case in Arkansas.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Island Time In Malta - A couple with two sons leaves their life in South Africa for calm, sunny Malta.

programme.title: Mediterranean Life S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Island Retreat In Croatia - A couple moves to her native Croatia to settle down and live a relaxed live by the sea.

programme.title: Duster Adventures: Kerala S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The stunning Kerala landscape shot in high-definition in a series that combines the best of off-road adventure and activities that are off-the-beaten-track.

programme.title: Baggage Battles S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Auction Prayers - In Quebec City, Valerie, Mark and Billy go to an auction in a church, but it isn't a blessed affair for all of them.

programme.title: The Road Less Traveled: Asia 2 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Philippines II - Jonathan is no stranger to the Philippines, but there's a lot more to explore!

programme.title: Grave Mysteries S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Mother Gone Missing - February, 2009: 32 year-old Becky Brosnan has disappeared.

programme.title: Living Alaska S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Saddling Up To Fairbanks - A busy Kentucky family is excited for outdoor adventures in the slower-paced town of Fairbanks.

programme.title: Living Alaska S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Highflying Adventure - Arizona pilots take a high-flying adventure and fall for Fairbanks.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Glacier Inferno Sea Serpent Cecil And Boogie Bomb - Don Wildman recounts a desperate race to escape a raging wildfire, investigates a real-life sea monster that made a splash along the New England coastline.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep40
programme.desc: Something Old, Something New / The Ghoster - Archibald stumbles into playing the part of a wedding planner as he attempts to help a frazzled groom pull off the perfect day. / Archibald unknowingly buys a haunted toaster and summons a ghost by mistake.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep7
programme.desc: Campfire Weekend / Girls Just Wanna Save Fun - When the girls can’t go to camp they create their very own on Harvey street. The story of how Audrey, Dot and Lotta first became the Harvey Girls.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep7
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Turbos / The Escargot Affair - Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don'T) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep40

But they need help: Captain Underpants’ brain cells to the rescue! And when it’s all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep31
programme.desc: Hard To Gettings / Tummy Fish - After Oh goes on a date with Sharzod, she wants to be in a serious relationship; When the parasites who live in Oh's tummy emerge, Tip is surprised to discover that she is a celebrity to them.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep31
programme.desc: Brain Switch / Koikawa Harumachi - When Peabody uses a brain-switching machine to let Sherman find out what it's like to be grown up, Sherman likes it so much he refuses to switch back

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky And The Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, it’s up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep18
programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land…. But only in exchange for one thing…. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest… who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip'S Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep29
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abysmal Altercation Of The Abominable Altitooth - Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep30
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bizarre Bout Of The Beastly Barfilisk - Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.desc: Swine And Roses - It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real “bad boy,” he learns of their true plans

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'Ll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep20
programme.desc: A Wanderer'S Christmas - Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome To Pawston \ Ruff Day On The Job - Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tag’s handiness - and one of Lady Lydia’s hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawston’s new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs Not Listening - Noddy's excitedly looking forward to his first ever go at driving Train. But then Revs starts playing up and won't listen when Noddy asks him to stop. Why is Revs not listening to him? A puzzled Noddy investigates to find out what's wrong with his friend.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep32
programme.desc: Stick With Me / Family Feudings - When a romance buds between Tip and Stick, the Boov Out Boys keep getting in the way; When Lucy's sister Linda comes to visit, Oh makes it his mission to make them get along

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep32
programme.desc: Super Sherman / Ada Lovelace - When a meteorite crashes into the Penthouse, Sherman transforms into a superhero and things go from bad to worse when Hobson turns into a supervillain

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky And The Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare he’ll never forget!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep19
programme.desc: Mall Is Well / Taco Tank - Turbo competes in a crazy underground race through a mall.//Tito trades in his food truck for a tank and goes on a wild ride through the city.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird… and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing… until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round… and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions – North, South, East and West – and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What'S My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum is Healthy! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is a fun and educational show for kids featuring classic and new nursery rhymes.

programme.desc: Lellobee City Farm is a fun, music-based show for preschoolers. Set in the fantastical urban micro-farm, where neighbourhood kids gather to play, sing and learn.

programme.title: Time For Quiet With Twinkle S1 Ep3

programme.desc: Come explore the world with Blippi! There are so many exciting things to explore and learn. Feed your kids’ curiosity while they learn about vehicles, animals, the natural world and so much more.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too – which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep116
programme.desc: The Thinking Squad - Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save The Hiding Elephants / Pups Save a Yodeler - Elephants become trapped in the Monkey Temple after a bee frightens them away from their watering hole. // When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep807
programme.desc: Pups Save a Yodeler - When Wingnut runs away from wolves that are attracted to his yodeling, he ends up trapped in a canyon. The Paw Patrol has to hurry to save him.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes / Tina's New Friend - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.// While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Legend of Capitán Calavera - When Santiago discovers the lost treasure of the legendary Capitán Calavera, he and his friends become the new Pirate Protectors of Isla Encanto.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George’s teeth are lovely and clean. But George’s plastic toy “Mr Dinosaur” teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Paddington and the FIngertrap / Paddington Rides a Scooter - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play. // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Trouble in Harmony Valley! - Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Story Time with Blue - We are almost ready to read but first we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel & Pail act out "Jack & Jill" and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Getting Glasses with Magenta - It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Compass Caper - Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save a Roo - It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep322
programme.desc: Grandpa at the Playground - Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Goldie the Fish - Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Sad Day with Blue - Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Catfish Capers / Bubble Debacle - Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan. // Sir Steel's attempts to clean up the Central Forest with a giant soap machine creates a huge bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lorelai's Bracelet / Cecelia And The Ghost Ship - Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form! // Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them. But when it starts to rain and the garden is covered in muddy puddles, they rush out to play together!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green - Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds! // Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Ultra Spy Tool! - When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Big News with Blue - Blue has something exciting to tell everybody! In this game of Blue's Clues, Josh and the viewer go on a note finding quest, solving riddles, and following treasure maps to find out the answer to Blue's Big News.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Happy Birthday Blue - It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants for her birthday. While we look for Clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns & take a trip to Joe's Present Store.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Trials of the Pirate Protector - On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Triton's Trumpet - Santiago and crew must retrieve a powerful undersea artifact after it's stolen by Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Best Friends Game - When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flying Disc Fling - When a robo-toy causes mayhem in Adventure Bay, Ryder knows just who to call to save the far flung flying disc!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Toast - The Teletubbies eat lots of Tubby Toast and make a huge pile of crumbs. Luckily, The Noo-Noo is on hand to clean up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Lion - Dee encourages a friend to say lion and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep53
programme.desc: Hill Stop - When a Po can't drive his little car over a big hill, the Team downsize the problem.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep37
programme.desc: It's Time for a Tea Party - JoJo & Gran Gran discover Ezra's having a Tyrannosaurus Tea Party at the Museum! But, when Ezra doesn't have time to make his special strawberry cake, Gran Gran has a plan to help!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Flower Power - Monty tries to get his family to play football with him, but they are all too busy doing flower-related activities.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Matching Socks - When Monty can't find a pair of matching socks, he begins to wonder why things have to match at all.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Helicopter - At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep20
programme.desc: The Crazy Golf Badge - It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep19
programme.desc: The Art Badge - The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it, while preparing their own pieces for Tino the artistic mouse's Woodland Biennale.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep18
programme.desc: The History Badge - The Squirrels get a very interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces from the past!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep44
programme.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada - The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep43
programme.desc: Bird Migration: Spain & Africa - In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Flatpack - While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep23

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Andy and the Pygmy Gecko - Andy jets off in his safari mobile to the rainforest of Brazil in search of a pygmy gecko.

programme.desc: Honeybees - Rory and Sandy are looking for honeybees, and Chantelle has a special view of a hive. Find out how honeybees help the planet and try this Teeny Tiny Task: make a wildflower seed ball!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep17
programme.desc: The Sharing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between everyone equally.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep16
programme.desc: The Philosophy Badge - The Squirrels think about life's big questions, helping Tino the artistic mouse escape a crisis of confidence and gaining their Philosophy badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep15
programme.desc: The Future Badge - The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot version of Duggee - and a few other interesting changes to the clubhouse too!

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Irrigation - Uh oh! Glitch accidently uses his size-ray to shrink the Go Jetters and Ubercorn so that they are the size of ants!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep6
programme.desc: Toby and the Whistling Woods - Toby braves the Whistling Woods on the way to the summer house.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep3

programme.desc: One Boot Off - Nelly and Nora help Oliver rescue his boot from a muddy puddle.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep20

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep10

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep104

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 15 - Geelong v Melbourne Ep83
programme.desc: 2022 Premiers Geelong host 2021 Premiers Melbourne to open Round 15 on a Thursday Night in Geelong. The Demons beat the top of the ladder Magpies to regain 3rd spot with 9 wins 4 losses, while the Cats sit 9th with 6-6.

programme.title: The Business Ep84
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show brings you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Spring Special Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Jane Edmanson takes a look at clematis, Tino Carnevale visits a Hobart market gardener, Jerry Coleby-Williams gets the inside scoop on potting mix, Josh Byrne tours an indoor jungle and Millie Ross gets set for spring.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep125
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest as Madeleine Morris and Emma Rebellato bring you up to date on overnight developments and all the news you need to know this morning. Plus Tony Armstrong with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep125
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Lorna Dunkley in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep125
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Gemma Veness brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Bamboo for Pandas, Growing Tea & Wicking Beds Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Costa Georgiadis explores an extensive Sydney garden, Clarence Slockee looks at new release plants, Tino Carnevale learns how to grow tea, and Sophie Thomson visits a bamboo orchard planted for pandas.

programme.title: Hannah Gadsby's OZ Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - If the Australian art cannon is to be believed this country was founded by an army of pioneer blokes in hats. Hannah picks beneath the paint of this hyper-masculine portrait to uncover a more feminine vision of our country.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Lauren Jackson Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Superstar basketballer Lauren Jackson was born to play the game. She joins Anh to talk about the realities of life as an elite athlete with an international career. Anh hopes to capture her strong persona and femininity.

programme.title: Throwback Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the creators, authors and entertainers who shaped Australia's childhood pop culture. Featuring Jeff Fatt from The Wiggles, Emily Rodda, Tina Matthews, and author of Tomorrow When The War Began John Marsden.

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Main Event - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep3

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The first time that Mugello hosted a Grand Prix event was in the year 1976, and the layout of the stunning Tuscan circuit, which undulates naturally within a beautiful tree lined valley, has remained practically the same ever since. The track was purchased by Ferrari in 1988 and renovated to their high standards shortly after - with excellent facilities and world class safety features. It became a permanent MotoGP™ venue from 1991 onwards. Italy’s love affair with bike racing is long and enduring. Manufacturers such as Mondial, Moto Guzzi, Gilera, MV Agusta, Morbidelli, Garelli, Cagiva and now Aprilia and Ducati all playing a role, in addition to great riders such as Giacomo Agostini and Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2315
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Prelims - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier
programme.desc: Main Event - Top five contenders intent on keeping their hopes for a middleweight championship alive, Marvin Vettori and Jared Cannonier square off in the main event of UFC on ESPN on June 18 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a win over rising star Roman Dolidze, Italy’s Vettori is determined to not let anyone pass him on the road to top, but he will have to survive the thunder thrown at him by Cannonier, who owns knockout victories over Anderson Silva, Jack Hermansson and Derek Brunson

programme.title: UFC 289: Nunes vs. Aldana
programme.desc: Prelims - In a year of excellence, Mexico may see its fourth world champion crowned. In the UFC’s return to Canada on June 10, Guadalajara’s Irene Aldana challenges Brazil’s Amanda Nunes for the UFC bantamweight title in the main event of UFC 289 at Vancouver’s Rogers Arena. Last July, the “Lioness” evened the score with Julianna Pena, regaining her title and setting up a meeting with Aldana, whose fight-altering power has led her to wins over Macy Chiasson, Yana Santos and Ketlen Vieira. Plus, in the co-main event, it’s a pivotal clash in the lightweight division when former champ Charles Oliveira battles surging contender Beneil Dariush
